00076 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 void CSafeModeDlg::OnEnChangeSafeModeSpeed()
00078 {
00079     UpdateData( TRUE );
00080     if( speed != "" )
00081         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00082     else
00083         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00084 }    /* OnEnChangeSafeModeSpeed() */
00085 
00086 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00090 //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 void CSafeModeDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00092 {
00093     UpdateData( TRUE );
00094     char    str[35];
00095 
00096     WideCharToMultiByte( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, speed, -1, str, 34, NULL, NULL );
00097     str[34] = '\0';
00098 
00099     mCom.sendFmiSafeModeSpeed( (float)atof( str ) );
00100 
00101     OnOK();
00102 }    /* OnBnClickedOk() */
